text:
Senior Full Stack | Alpha | Onsite | New York, NY

We're building _the_ platform for on-demand user insights. Used by Fortune 500s - see some of our clients at alphahq.com.

* Flexible hours * Unlimited vacation policy * Stack built on Sinatra, Mongo, and modern Javascript (ES6+)

To apply, shoot Haggai an email at haggai@alphahq.com . Please include 'Senior Full Stack - HN' in the title of the email.
